effect: b'On Enter: Draw seven cards.'

name: Arisanna, Herbalist Prodigy
effect: b'On Enter: Gather twice. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)'
flavor_text: b'"Adjuvants, catalysts, and materia abound! This world offers so much potential for research and experimentation. Now, what about this mixture?"'

name: Arisanna, Master Alchemist
effect: b'Arisanna Lineage (Arisanna, Master Alchemist must be leveled from a previous level "Arisanna" champion.)\nOn Enter: Gather twice.\nInherited Effect: At the beginning of your end phase, you may sacrifice two Herbs with the same name. If you do, draw a card.'

name: Arisanna, Astral Zenith
effect: b"Arisanna Lineage\nOnce per turn, you may pay 0rather than pay a card's starcalling costs.
flavor_text: b'The chosen luminary of the celestial heavens. Her advent foretells both devastation and salvation.'

name: Diana, Keen Huntress
effect: b"Lineage Release \xe2\x80\x94 Materialize a Gun card from your material deck. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)
flavor_text: b'A talented archer in a past life, her mastery of firearms came naturally while on Azoth. '

name: Diana, Deadly Duelist
effect: b'Diana Lineage (Diana, Deadly Duelist must be leveled from a previous level "Diana" champion.)\nOn Enter: Materialize a Bullet card from your material deck. (You still pay its costs.)\nInherited Effect: Ranged 2'

name: Diana, Duskstalker
effect: b"Diana Lineage\nOn Enter: Diana becomes distant. \nOn Champion Hit: Generate a Creeping Torment card and put it on the bottom of the hit champion's lineage. (To generate, add that card from outside of the game.)

name: Tonoris, Lone Mercenary
effect: b"On Enter: Tonoris gains taunt until the beginning of your next turn. (While awake, this unit must be targeted before other units you control during your opponents' attack declarations if able.)
flavor_text: b'Exiled and purged, he searches for his own truth.'

name: Tonoris, Might of Humanity
effect: b'Tonoris Lineage (Tonoris, Might of Humanity must be leveled from a previous level "Tonoris" champion.)\nOn Enter: Tonoris\' next attack this turn gets +3 power.'
flavor_text: b"With replenished strength, Tonoris serves as a beacon of hope for humanity's salvation.

name: Tonoris, Genesis Aegis
effect:
b'Tonoris Lineage
At the beginning of your recollection phase, choose one that hasn\xe2\x80\x99t been chosen\xe2\x80\x94 
\xe2\x80\xa2 Summon an Obelisk of Armaments token.
\xe2\x80\xa2 Summon an Obelisk of Fabrication token.
\xe2\x80\xa2 Summon an Obelisk of Protection token.'

name: Blastshot Pump
effect: b"(Gun \xe2\x80\x94 Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.)\n[Class Bonus] If combat damage would be dealt to a unit by an attack using Blastshot Pump, that damage is dealt to that unit and an additional unit you don't control instead.

name: Bulwark Sword
effect: b"[Class Bonus] Bulwark Sword gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)\nAs an additional cost to use this weapon for an attack, pay 2.

name: Charged Manaplate
effect: b"[Class Bonus] Banish Charged Manaplate: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has taken 4 or more damage this turn. (Activate this ability only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Cleric Robes
effect: b'[Class Bonus] On Enter: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion\xe2\x80\x99s class matches this card\xe2\x80\x99s class.)\n1, REST: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to your champion this turn.'

name: Crest of the Alliance
effect: b'Whenever a fostered ally you control dies, you may banish Crest of the Alliance. If you do, draw a card.'
flavor_text: b"The precarious truce across nations brokered in the face of an unstoppable force gave rise to the Alliance\xe2\x80\x94humanity's final defense.

name: Flash Grenade
effect: b"[Class Bonus] On Enter: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)\nBanish Flash Grenade: Until end of turn, if damage would be dealt to a distant unit you control, prevent 3 of that damage.

name: Ingredient Pouch
effect: b'1, REST: Gather. (To gather, summon a Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token, chosen at random.)'
flavor_text: b"An herbalist's joy and an alchemist's treasure. Always surprising how much can actually fit inside.

name: Life Essence Amulet
effect: b"Whenever an ally you control dies while it's not your turn, you may banish Life Essence Amulet. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: b'"It is said a great alchemist made this amulet for his lover should she be at death\'s door."\r\n\xe2\x80\x94 Gildas, Chronicler of Aesa'

name: Necklace of Foresight
effect: b'[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to materialize.\nBanish Necklace of Foresight: Glimpse 4. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)'

name: Plated Bullet
effect: b"Renewable (If this card would be banished from the field or an intent, put it into its owner's material deck instead.)\nREST: Load Plated Bullet into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.)

name: Powercharged Shield
effect: b'Banish Powercharged Shield: Target unit with taunt gains vigor until end of turn. (Units with vigor wake up at the beginning of your end phase.)'
flavor_text: b'Caution: excessive alchemical kinetic conversion may cause myo-paralysis and rapid internal disintegration.'

name: Prototype Pistol
effect: b"(Gun \xe2\x80\x94 Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.)\n[Class Bonus] On Enter: Prototype Pistol gets +1 power until end of turn. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Prototype Staff
effect: b'[Class Bonus] [Memory 4+] Your champion gets +1 level. (Apply this effect only there are four or more cards in your memory.)\n[Level 4+] REST: You may put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. If you do, draw a card into your memory.'

name: Quickdraw Piercer
effect: b"(Gun \xe2\x80\x94 Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.)\n[Class Bonus] On Banish: Draw a card. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Scale of Souls
effect: b'[Class Bonus] Balance \xe2\x80\x94 At the beginning of your recollection phase, if the amount of cards in your hand and memory are equal, recover 2.\n2, REST: Return a card from your memory to your hand.'

name: Synth Disrupter
effect: b'Banish Synth Disrupter: Until end of turn, Automaton allies enter the field rested.'
flavor_text: b'Repurposed in haste to jam and scramble electrical signals characteristic to automatons.'

name: Tasershot
effect: b'Renewable\nREST: Load Tasershot into target unloaded Gun weapon you control.\n[Class Bonus] On Champion Hit: Until the beginning of your next turn, whenever the hit champion levels up, deal 4 unpreventable damage to them.'

name: Worn Gearblade
effect: b'[Class Bonus] REST, Remove a durability counter from Worn Gearblade: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.\nWhenever an Automaton ally you control dies, put a durability counter on Worn Gearblade.'

name: Penetrator Round
effect: b'Renewable\nREST: Load Penetrator Round into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. \n[Class Bonus] [Level 2+] On Attack: This attack gains "Combat damage dealt by this attack is unpreventable."'

name: Deployment Beacon
effect: b"On Enter: Summon an Automaton Drone token.\n[Class Bonus] On Leave: Summon an Automaton Drone token. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor_text: b'Rapid call to action with automated directives.'

name: Cosmic Astroscope
effect: b'[Class Bonus] If an opponent would glimpse X, you may have that player glimpse 3 instead.\nREST: Glimpse 3. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)'

name: Archon Broadsword
effect: b"As an additional cost to use this weapon for an attack, pay 2.\n[Class Bonus] Archon Broadsword gets +1 power for each token you control. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Sentinel Fabricator
effect: b'3, REST : Summon an Automaton Drone token with a buff counter on it.'
flavor_text: b'Once an alchemist masters the composition and synthesis of an object, improvements follow.'

name: Shadow's Twin
effect: b"Whenever Shadow's Twin becomes loaded, it gets +2 power until end of turn.\n[Class Bonus] Whenever an attack using this weapon triggers an On Hit ability, that ability is triggered an additional time.

name: Academy Attendant
effect: b"[Class Bonus] [Memory 4+] Academy Attendant gets +1 power. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class and only if there are four or more cards in your memory.)
flavor_text: b"Capable of cataloging the Academy's vast research.

name: Automaton Drone
flavor_text: b"Schedule routine maintenance examinations every two years. Do not expose to temperatures in excess of 500 degrees for prolonged periods.\n\xe2\x80\x94 Manufacturer's Recommendations

name: Backstep
effect: b"Target unit becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)\nDraw a card.
flavor_text: b'Any good demolitionist knows to take a few steps back before admiring their own handiwork.'

name: Barter Herbs
effect: b'Sacrifice up to two Herbs. For each Herb sacrificed this way, summon your choice of Blightroot, Manaroot, Silvershine, Fraysia, Razorvine, or Springleaf token. \n[Class Bonus] Floating Memory'

name: Blightroot
effect: b'Sacrifice Blightroot: Your champion gets +1 level until end of turn.'

flavor_text: b'An inexhaustible servant with programmed routines.'

effect: b"REST: Load Incendiary Shot into target unloaded Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.)\n[Class Bonus] On Hit: Deal 2 damage to the hit unit.

If that unit is rested, deal 1+LV damage to it instead. Until end of turn, allies enter the field rested.

name: Flash Freeze
effect: b"[Class Bonus] This card costs 2 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)\nNegate target card activation unless its controller pays LV. Banish the card that had its activation negated this way.

name: Hypothermia
effect: b'Target rested ally gets -4 life until end of turn.'
flavor_text: b'Rest once, and you may never rise again.'

name: Krustallan Distiller
effect: b"[Class Bonus] On Enter: If you've brewed a Potion this turn, draw a card into your memory. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)

name: Perfect Repulsion
effect: b'The next time target unit you control would take exactly X damage this turn, prevent that damage, where X is the amount of cards in your memory. Draw a card if damage was prevented this way. (X is calculated only as this card resolves.)'

name: Potion Infusion: Clarity
effect: b'[Class Bonus] This card costs 2 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion\'s class matches this card\'s class.)\nRest target Potion. If you do, it gains "On Sacrifice: Draw two cards" until end of turn. (This trigger would resolve before the Potion\'s ability.)'

effect: b'Rest target Potion. If you do, it gains "On Sacrifice: Rest target unit. The next time that unit would take damage from a water element source this turn, it takes that much damage plus 4 instead" until end of turn. (This trigger would resolve before the Potion\'s ability.)'

(To suppress an ally, banish it and return it to the field under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end phase. Activate this ability only while this card is in an intent.)

effect: b'[Class Bonus] Foster \nOn Foster: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may reveal an ally card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.'

If you do, put all other cards you're looking at on the bottom of your deck in any order.)\nDeal 3 damage to all non-astra element units. Class Bonus: Deal 4 damage to those units instead.

If you do, put all other cards you're looking at on the bottom of your deck in any order.)\nDeal 4 damage to target unit plus an additional 2 for each card named Cosmic Bolt in your graveyard and banishment.

name: Aurousteel Greatsword
flavor_text: b"Neos-infused steel forms to the wielder's core disposition and grandest desires.

name: Neos Sight
effect: b'Draw a card. If you control eight or more objects, draw a card into your memory.'

flavor_text: b'Destructive power with the weight of the world.'

effect: b'[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate for each domain you control.\nSummon two Automaton Drone tokens each with a buff counter on them.'

name: Anathema's End
effect: b"REST: Load Anathema's End into target unloaded Gun weapon you control.\n[Class Bonus] On Champion Hit: Banish all Curse cards in the hit champion's lineage. For each card banished this way, deal 2 unpreventable damage to that champion.

name: Creeping Torment
effect: b"On Enter: Put Creeping Torment on the bottom of target champion's lineage.\nInherited Effect: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, deal 2 unpreventable damage to this object. (Champions have this ability as long as this card is part of its lineage.)

name: Mindbreak Bullet
effect: b"REST: Load Mindbreak Bullet into target unloaded Gun weapon you control.\n[Class Bonus] On Champion Hit: Look at that opponent's memory and discard a card from it.

name: Umbra Sight
effect: b"Draw a card.\nYou may draw a card into your memory and put Umbra Sight on the bottom of your champion's lineage. When you do, deal 2 unpreventable damage to your champion for each Curse card in your champion's lineage.

name: Umbral Tithe
effect: b"This card costs 1 less to activate for each Curse card in each champion's lineage. \nEach player draws two cards into their memory. Then deal 4 damage to each champion controlled by players with six or more cards in their memory.

name: Violet Haze
effect: b"All units you control become distant, then put Violet Haze on the bottom of target champion's lineage.\nInherited Effect: This object gets -2 life.
flavor_text: b'Obscure their sight, then dampen their senses.'
